snippet: The Nets will hold their first practice on Sunday at the team’s new arena, the Barclays Center, making a small bit of history with every dribble as the team’s starting five learn to play together.
abstract: Brooklyn Nets are set to hold their first practice at new Barclays Center arena.
lead_paragraph: The Nets will hold their first practice on Sunday at the team’s new arena, the Barclays Center, making a small bit of history with every dribble as the team’s starting five learn to play together.

headline.seo: Another First at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn: Practice for the Nets
headline.main: Another Big Day at Barclays Center in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: Another Nets First: A Practice In Brooklyn
